text: Justin Theroux and Aubrey Plaza. Since Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux officially split last month, friends of Theroux have been telling the tabloids how happy Theroux is to be back to his “ edgy ” New York lifestyle. He ’ s been spending time with the “ edgy ” art crowd, which includes photographer Petra Collins. And now, he ’ s apparently hanging out with Aubrey Plaza. Is Plaza edgy? She must be. The Daily Mail published several photos of Theroux and Plaza together this morning. The two were spotted walking around downtown on Sunday and going into Theroux ’ s West Village apartment.
